title: Ticket #5496: test for condor_q -batch
description:
A test for condor_q -batch. The test includes:

  • a test of multiple jobs with different states and different Cluster Ids. The result should show multiple lines, each of which contains one single job.

  • a test of condor_q -dag with same batch_name, the dag submit file example is from cmd_q_shows-dag.run

  • a test of condor_q -run where jobs have different Cluster Ids. The result should only show jobs in run state and each line is one single job.

  • a test of jobs with same Cluster Id and different Proc Id (Job Batch Name not specified). The result should be one single line with JOB_IDS area having the correct value.

  • a test of jobs with several Cluster Ids, each one of which shared by some different Proc Ids jobs (Job Batch Name not specified). Each line should be a batch of jobs with the same Cluster Id.
